longMSG:
You are in a garage on the 1st floor. 
 There are a car and a tool cabinet.
 You may go...
    northwest to the living room through the house-to-garage door, or
    south to the courtyard through the garage door.
shortMSG:
You are in a garage on the 1st floor. 
 Features: car, tool cabinet
 Areas you may go to:
    north - house-to-garage door to the living room - 1st floor
    south - garage door to the courtyard - 1st floor
